languages.text: This hood grants the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Grants +10 bonus to Willpower tests and a −10 penalty to Weapon and Ballistic Skills tests.
This hood grants the wearer a +10 bonus to Willpower and +15% damage to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 penalty to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill.

This hood grants the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

This hood grants the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

languages.text: Дает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и +15% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} от психосил и сил навигатора, но уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} на 10.
languages.original_text: This hood grants the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Дает +10 к Воле и +15% к наносимому урону от психосил и сил навигатора, но уменьшает Ближний Бой и Дальний Бой на 10.
Дает +10 к Воле и +15% к наносимому урону от психосил и сил навигатора, но уменьшает Ближний Бой и Дальний Бой на 10.

languages.text: 这件兜帽可以使装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高10点，灵能能力与导航者能力造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高15%，但{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}会降低10点。
languages.original_text: This hood grants the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 这件兜帽可以使装备者的意志提高10点，灵能能力与导航者能力造成的伤害提高15%，但武器技能与弹道技能会降低10点。

languages.text: このフードは使用者に、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}に+10の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}、および超能力と航宙士パワーの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+15%を与えるが、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道技能{/g}に−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を加える。
languages.original_text: This hood grants the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このフードの着用者は、意志力に+10のボーナスと、超能力と航宙士の能力に+15％のダメージを与えるが、武器スキルと弾道スキルに−10のペナルティを加える。

languages.text: Esta capucha proporciona al portador una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +10 a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y una bonificación del +15 % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de poderes psíquicos y de navegante, pero inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}.
languages.original_text: This hood grants the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta capucha proporciona al portador una bonificación de +10 a Voluntad y una bonificación del +15 % al daño de poderes psíquicos y de navegante, pero inflige una penalización de -10 a la Habilidad de armas y la Habilidad de proyectiles.

languages.text: Diese Kapuze gewährt dem Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 auf die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} für Psionik- und Navigator-Kräfte, verursacht aber einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}.
languages.original_text: This hood grants the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kapuze gewährt dem Träger einen Bonus von +10 auf die Willenskraft und +15 % Schaden auf Psionik- und Navigator-Kräfte, verursacht aber einen Abzug von -10 auf Waffenfertigkeit und Ballistik-Fertigkeit.

languages.text: Cette capuche confère à son utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +10 et augmente de +15 % les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des pouvoirs psychiques et des pouvoirs de navigateur, mais elle inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}.
languages.original_text: This hood grants the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette capuche confère à son utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +10 et augmente de +15 % les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des pouvoirs psychiques et des pouvoirs de navigateur, mais elle inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}.

languages.text: Bu kukuleta, takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliğine +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazandırır ve ruhsezi ile Rotacı güçlerinin verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} da +%15 artırır ancak {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliklerine −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: This hood grants the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.
